content.value: Structured Roadmap provides a machine-readable JSON intermediate representation for project roadmaps with deterministic Markdown generation. It is designed to complement [Structured Changelog](https://github.com/grokify/structured-changelog).

version_history.summary: Initial release with JSON IR and Markdown generation
